lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Treasury Secretary James Baker's remarks at the weekend indicating the need to revise it do not herald a lower range for the dollar, other senior officials from the Bank of Japan and Finance Ministry agreed in interviews.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Group of Seven (G-7) industrial nations still comply with last February's Louvre accord to stabilize currencies, a senior Bank of Japan official said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Japanese monetary officials said Baker's undisguised pressure on West Germany to refrain from guiding interest rates higher may be part of a process of multilateral surveillance, or international economic policy coordination.
